{"rule":"EN_A_VS_AN","sentence":"^\\QEvery time an \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q command is run, the session's updates its user abbreviations with the latest from the user abbreviations file.\\E$"}

{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\QSpace expands abbreviations\nCtrlSpace is a normal space\nEnter expands and accepts abbreviations\\E$"}
{"rule":"ENGLISH_WORD_REPEAT_RULE","sentence":"^\\Q\\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q If following an abbreviation, expands it Not bound\n\\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q If following an abbreviation, expands it; then accepts the line Enter\n\\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q If following an abbreviation, expands it; then adds a space Space\\E$"}
{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\QIn the following example, additional bindings are added such that Ctrle expands abbreviations without adding a trailing space and Ctrla has the same behavior as Space.\\E$"}
